title: Swiss Re fonts
content:
Hi all,   
   
does anyone know who designed/modified the Swiss Re fonts (Swiss Re Sans), a derivate of Univers. Also, I believe that 1995 Swiss Re had a CI update by some London design agency. Does anyone know who this agency was?   
   
Many thanks in advance.   
Bruno Maag   
Dalton Maag Ltd
